import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import "./Footer.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Item from 'antd/lib/list/Item'; import axios from 'axios'; const Footer = () => { const [footer, setFooter] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/footer") .then(response => { setFooter(prev => [...prev, ...response.data]) }) }, []) return (
{footer.map((item) => {
Компания

О нас

Новости

Помощь

Контакты

{item.phone}

{item.phone}

{item.mail}

Мы в социальных сетях

{item.insta}

{item.tel}

{item.wa}

{item.text}

})}
); }; export default Footer;
